document_data.mainbody:
oonstar Alley was a small side alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Moonstar Alley was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. The alley cut between the Street of the Singing Dolphin and the Street of Whispers, enclosing the Moonstar estate and several other buildings. Another alley called Sharras Flight connected with the southern side of Moonstar Alley.
The alley was named for the presence of the Moonstar noble family. However, Waterdeeps first temple to Sel√ªne, called the High House of Stars, was first located here.
* Moonstar Villa
